description: Ranatunga Arachchilage Sunil Harshadewa Vs. Kotte Hewa and another before Hon. D.N. Samarakoon, J.
parties: Ranatunga Arachchilage Sunil Harshadewa Vs. Kotte Hewa and another
keywords: Settlement or compromise under section 408 of the Civil Procedure Code - the requirement of following the procedure laid down in sections 408 and 91 the failure of which makes the agreement voidable on that ground alone - Matters to be considered by courts in setting aside compromise decrees
